revised_title: Kerguelen Island and Rodriguez Zoological Collections: Diptera and Their Adaptations
tldr: The author describes the zoological collections of Diptera (two-winged insects) from Kerguelen Island and Rodriguez, made during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in 1874-75. They discuss the various adaptations of these insects to their environment, such as their wings, body structure, and behavior, which help them survive in the harsh conditions of the islands.
